alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 3:29PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Oregon, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon. In Washington, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall is forecast Saturday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington
